data.Name: JD McPherson (with The Patient Zeros)
data.Description: JD McPherson (with The Patient Zeros)DOORS OPEN: TIMEMEMBER PRESALE: Thursday, May 5th - 10:00amVIP ON SALE: Friday, May 6th - 10:00amGA ON SALE: Thursday, August 4th - 10:00amVIP TICKETS: Everyone over age 6 must have their own VIP ticket to gain entry to the VIP section. Please bring your digital or printed out ticket to the venue to gain entry and pick up your VIP wristband at the Levitt check-in tent upon arrival. VIP tickets are $35.00 per person and include the following:Access to premium viewing location in the VIP section1 FREE drink of choiceVIP bar access and separate bar lineLimited lounge seating (when available - you are encouraged to bring your own blanket & lawn chair to guarantee seating). FREE GENERAL ADMISSION TICKETS: General Admission tickets are one ticket per person. Lawn seating, no chairs are provided. Free ticket holders are asked to arrive at the venue by 20 minutes past showtime, otherwise your ticket may be forfeitâ€‹ to walkup guests.______________________________________________
